name: GKPlayerConnectionState
desc: The possible states of a connection to a match.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: An undetermined state in which the player can’t receive data.

items.name: case connected
items.desc: A state in which a player connects to the match and can receive data.

items.name: case disconnected
items.desc: A state in which a player disconnects from the match and can’t receive data.
